subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams scored 11 of his 15 points in the fourth quarter and the Utah Jazz won their eighth straight, rallying to beat the visiting Los Angeles Lakers, 114-108, last night and improve to an N.B.A.-best 12-1.
snippet: Deron Williams scored 11 of his 15 points in the fourth quarter and the Utah Jazz won their eighth straight, rallying to beat the visiting Los Angeles Lakers, 114-108, last night and improve to an N.B.A.-best 12-1.
